messages.title: Time to choose
messages.content: From a strong economy, to more police on our streets, good schools and hospitals, to a better Britain in a better Europe. Labour stands for fairness and for their communities.

messages.title: The right choice for Tynemouth
messages.content: Alan Campbell. A record that deserves your support. Vote Labour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting more police on the streets.
Supporting a better Britain in a better Europe.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election... is a choice between a Labour Government... or a Tory Government... A choice between Alan Campbell and the Conservative... The only major party that can beat Conservative here is Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: A better Britain in a better Europe.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour stands for fairness and... communities.

contactInformation.address: Unit 4, Northumberland Court, Front Street, Tynemouth, NE30 4AY

quotes.text: My pledges to you are clear: More Labour investment now in the basics, in our childrenâ€™s future. Full-time police back on our streets. A Fair deal for all our pensioners. A cleaner and safer environment.
